Text: Dodge Ram Quad Cab SLT x SwbTo Kevin Hyatt From Jim McKinney Subject Dodge Ram Door Quad Cab SLT x WB INCLUDES A YEAR MILE POWERTRAIN WARRANTY Thank you for choosing Goodson Dodge Internet while in your search for a great deal without the hassles We feel as our customers do that there is more to a great deal than just a low price The model Dodge Ram Quad Cab listed below is in stock We have others available or we would be glad to order one for you If you wish to change the equipment requested please revise and return You can reach me at to discuss your purchase If I am not available ask for my son Tom McKinney Jim McKinney Internet Sales Manager Goodson Dodge Katy Freeway Houston Texas Phone Number Fax Number URL wwwgoodsonautocom Quote for a Dodge Ram Quad Cab SLT x WB Model Ram Quad Cab SLT x WB Package G Exterior Color Bright Silver Metallic Clear Coat Interior Color Dark Slate Gray Engine L V HP Options Multispeed Automatic transmission Cloth bench seat Air conditioning Power windows Power door locks Power heated foldaway mirrors Overhead console with trip computer Cruise control Tilt steering wheel Four wheel disc brakes AMFMCassette Chrome wheels Bodyside molding Floor mats Carpet SLT package Availability In Stock Stock Number S VIN DHANS Total Before Discount Less Customer Preferred Discount Less Factory Incentive Less Goodson Dodge Internet Discount Total Discounts YOUR PRICE Price Good Through Jan Quoted price includes applicable incentives but does not include taxes title and registration
